dc:rights: This image is in the public domain and may be used without permission. Kindly provide attribution to the University of Michigan Bentley Historical Library.
dc:description: When this image was taken this building was a hospital.  Built 1840.  Professors' Houses (East Residence) 1840-1868.  University Hospital 1868-1891.  Additions in 1877 and after in the form of two parallel wings built out from back of house and several additions onto them.  Dental College 1891-1908.  Building removed 1908.  Replaced by new Chemistry Building 1910

dc:memberOf.title: Bentley Image Bank, Bentley Historical Library
